name: async-redux
description: Provides snippets and commands for Async Redux state management library.

async-redux.enableSnippets.description: Whether to include snippets in code completion

async-redux.business.generateExports.description: Whether to generate exports file containing redux actions and state.

async-redux.business.state.generateFreez.description: Whether to generate redux state as freezed class.

async-redux.business.state.name.description: Name of the generated redux state class.

async-redux.business.state.importPath.description: Import path pointing to redux state class.
async-redux.business.state.importPath.patternErrorMessage: Value has to be valid Dart file import path

async-redux.business.action.baseName.description: Name of redux base action class.

async-redux.business.action.importPath.description: Import path pointing to base redux action class.

async-redux.business.action.includeState.description: Whether to include state in action's type parameters.

async-redux.client.generateExports.description: Whether to generate exports file containing client files.

async-redux.client.connector.includeWidg.description: Whether to include widget's suffix at the end of connector's name.

async-redux.client.viewModel.baseName.description: Name of redux base view model class.

async-redux.client.viewModel.importPath.description: Import path pointing to redux view model class.
async-redux.client.viewModel.importPath.patternErrorMessage: Value has to be valid Dart file import path

async-redux.client.viewModelFactory.base.description: Name of the redux base view model factory class.

async-redux.client.viewModelFactory.impo.description: Import path pointing to redux view model factory class.
async-redux.client.viewModelFactory.impo.patternErrorMessage: Value has to be valid Dart file import path

async-redux.client.viewModelFactory.incl.description: Whether to include state in view model factory type parameters.
